H0.text: What are the flat treeless plains of Argentina called. Chaco

H1.text: What are the flat treeless plains of Argentina called. Estepa

H2.text: What are the flat treeless plains of Argentina called. Llanura

H3.text: What are the flat treeless plains of Argentina called. Pampa

A4.text: The Pampas are also known as the Pampas Plain.

A5.text: The pristine pampas were treeless regions, as debated in the text.
